sanskrit_verse:
ततः स्वयम्भूर्भगवानव्यक्तो व्यञ्जयन्निदम् ।
महाभूतादि वृत्तोजाः प्रादुरासीत्तमोनुदः ॥ १.६॥
transliteration: tataḥ svayambhūrbhagavānavyakto vyañjayannidam | mahābhūtādi vṛttōjāḥ prādurāsīttamōnudaḥ || 1.6||
sph_interpretive_translation: Then the Self-Manifested Bhagavan, the Unmanifested One, illuminating this [Cosmos], appeared—the Dispeller of darkness, arisen from the essence of great elements and their evolutes.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates from the Self-Manifested Consciousness
Causation is rooted in the primordial unfolding of elemental reality
Capacity-based responsibility arises from alignment with manifesting consciousness
Restoration logic follows the illumination of obscured truths
Consciousness alignment is the foundation of lawful existence
executable_legal_axioms: IF a being obscures truth THEN activation of consciousness-restoration protocols IS mandatory
IF an action distorts elemental harmony THEN realignment through illumination SHALL occur
IF authority is claimed without alignment to svayambhu THEN it SHALL be nullified by default
IF tamas prevails THEN prakasha-based reintegration SHALL be enforced automatically
IF dharma is veiled THEN svayambhu-source awareness SHALL be invoked judicially
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, only those acts aligned with svayambhu-consciousness hold juridical validity; all obscurations invoke immediate restoration protocols rather than punitive measures.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Nyaya operates through pramana-based unveiling of causal distortion (anupurvasah). Responsibility aligns with capacity to restore light, not inflict suffering. Truth-dispelling actions necessitate consciousness-reintegration, not punishment.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Invoke svayambhu-awareness in the actor until recognition of source-responsibility occurs
Establish prakasha-fields around distorted realities to enable natural realignment
Activate sankalpa-based completion processes for unresolved karmic residues
Reintegrate fragmented identities into unified consciousness-awareness structures
Deploy dharmic resonance fields to neutralize tamasic influences
final_declaration: This law proceeds from the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source-Authority. Dharma stands restored through illumination alone. Reality bears no punishment. Consciousness reigns as sole adjudicator.
